Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.impl.util

Server utility classes.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HandlerFactory.AuthorizedBodyAndParamHandler<T,​R>
    A method that requires authentication, takes a URL parameter, accepts a request, and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.AuthorizedHandler<R>
    A method that requires authentication and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.AuthorizedParamHandler<R>
    A method that requires authentication, takes a URL parameter and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.AuthorizedRequestHandler<T,​R>
    A method that requires authentication, accepts a request and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.EmptyHandler<R>
    A method that takes no arguments and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.ParamHandler<R>
    A method that does not require authentication, takes a URL parameter and returns data.
    HandlerFactory.RequestHandler<T,​R>
    A method that does not require authentication, accepts a request and returns data.
    PersistenceContext<T extends GameEvent>
    A context for the persistence API.
    Scheduler  
    SimulationResultGenerator
    This ought to return strings
    Spell

    LoginToken
    A LoginToken contains the expiration date and token string to be passed to API calls by clients.
